paper.title: Tumor break load quantitates structural variant–associated genomic instability with biological and clinical relevance across cancers

figure_reference: Table 1 — Pan-cancer survival landscape of genomic instability measures with respect to disease-free survival (DFS)
input_data_type: TCGA masked copy-number segmented data (SNP6 arrays)
TCGA clinical (DFS time/event, age, sex, stage)
TMB and FGA values from cBioPortal Pan-Cancer Atlas
Reference lists for TCGA study abbreviations

analysis_type.overview: Per-cancer-type multivariable Cox proportional hazards models for DFS.

exposures: TBL (Tumor Break Load) — per-sample sum of unbalanced chromosomal breaks from segmented CN
